expression.usage: Flags the system as offline, to prevent accessing the network to resolve artifacts or execute plugins.
expression.addendum: NOTE: It's also possible to switch to offline mode on a per-build basis, using the '-o' command-line option.

expression.usage: If false, flags the system to skip prompting the user for any information, or holding up the build waiting for any input.
expression.addendum: NOTE: It's also possible to switch to batch (ie. non-interactive) mode using the '-B' command-line option.
